text: Motion
Motion
Motion

─Recently, sorry for not having much time to rest.
Are you tired?

I'm fine.
Work is fun.
...I see, that's good.
What are we doing today?

After this, we have a variety show recording.
It starts soon after we arrive. Are you okay with that?
Of course!

Comedians and celebrities,
everyone's so funny!

Haha, that's reassuring.
It's great that Asahi enjoys it.
Yes!

...Oh, but──
I also like lessons.

Indeed.
Asahi looks lively during lessons too.

Yeah.
I can move around a lot──
It's fun to have more things I can do.

During filming and recording,
there's a lot of time spent sitting still.

That's true...
Yet, you manage to handle a lot.

────Oh, but one more thing.
There's something else you like, right?

One more thing...
Ah! It's the stage!

Haha, it's so obvious
I didn't even think to mention it.
